article: We want to go on a trip to Beijing. But it is too  far from  our home. My father wants to go by bus, because it is  _ . But my mother wants to go by  _ , because it's faster. When I get to the  train station , I feel happy, and I jump up and down, because I haven't seen the train  _ . We buy two tickets. Why? We have four people. Oh, you guess it!
